subject: Re: [junit] Doubt in Httpservletrequest and  Httpservletresponse
msgSnippet: ... That s exactly the reason of JUnit-addons.  So feel free to send me the code once it s written, tested and you have used it for a couple of weeks (so that
messageBody:
> Someone please write this ONCE then publish it for everyone else in the world to use!

That's exactly the reason of JUnit-addons. So feel free to send me the
code once it's written, tested and you have used it for a couple of
weeks (so that I know it's really useful).

-Vladimir

Vladimir R. Bossicard
